name: Gelli for Breakfast
description:
Expect Bugs! A game about making a yummy Gelli breakfast. Gellis aren't friends, there food. 1-3 minute play. No keys are used in this game, just click/tap on things!

Started working on this game VERY late. :( I was very sleepy when this got finnish so expect things to be weird/wrong/broken. I'm new to game making so I'd love to hear anything good or bad about this game! Its not much but it's something. Most game by me are made using Scratch.

My speed run time: 00m:15s:28ms
